abstract: Works in Progress column; former Wall Street banker Rich Marin is building New York Wheel, 60-story high Ferris wheel in St George, Staten Island; project's chief exec says when completed in 2018, 630-foot structure which will be biggest observation wheel in world, giving millions of tourists who ride Staten Island Ferry for its views of New York Harbor reason to hang around borough.

headline.print_headline: Rolling Out a Huge Wheel on the Shore
headline.main: Rolling Out a Huge Wheel on the Staten Island Shore

snippet: With parts arriving from around the world, the 630-foot New York Wheel is taking shape. The observation ride is expected to be a draw for the millions of tourists to take the free ferry each year....
lead_paragraph: With parts arriving from around the world, the 630-foot New York Wheel is taking shape. The observation ride is expected to be a draw for the millions of tourists to take the free ferry each year.
